page.title: 04A DAY IN OUR LIFE
page.content: I get up at 6.oo and then I call for my friend Craig. We then decide what we are going to do. Sometimes we go to the airfield. We look for bullets,live or dead. We still collect them. Then we look for clues of planes and jeeps and tanks ,then we look for clues of bunkers and ditches,and next we have dinner at 12.00. We walk home. That's about an hour and we tell our friends. We have tea at 4.00 and then we play army and we play cops and robbers and we are the baddies. Then we go in and watch t.v. I go to bed at 9.00 and I read for 20 minutes.This is a typical Saturday
